title: McAfee Security - VirusScan 8.0 Pro + Personal Firewall 2004

Includes the latest version of VirusScan to protect your computer from viruses, Trojans, Internet worms, harmful scripts, and other malware. With automated updates VirusScan keeps your computing free of even the latest threats.


Includes McAfeeÃ‚Â® Personal Firewall Plus
Includes the latest version of McAfee Personal Firewall Plus. McAfee Personal Firewall Plus enables you to control the communications in and out of your PC and helps keep hackers at bay. With the new Intelligent Application Handling using the necessary protections of a personal firewall has never been easier. McAfee Personal Firewall Plus provides essential security for your Internet connection.
